subject.normal: How does a non-profit upgrade from a TEAM account.

body.para: for Google apps refer to it help forum at

you will need to delete the Team edition and then sign up for the standard edition account and then request upgrade to the education edition there is no cost for the education or standard edition accounts.

quote.quotepara: I opened a team account for the non-profit that I work for to see how the Google Apps suite would support us. After 1-month we are in love with the Google Calendar and Docs but we were hesitant to move email until we had sampled the other apps.
We are now ready to move our email over and we need the additional storage space that comes with an upgrade, but the only upgrade link that I can find is requiring a payment of $50. per user.
It was my understanding when I opened the Free Team Account that non- profits can have a Google Apps account for free. We are a registered 501(c)3 that includes a school and community organization.
My questions are: 1) Where do I click from within our current Team account to upgrade our account as a "non-profit school"? (Please provide step-by-step clicks).
2) If I cannot upgrade from within our current Team account and must create a new account, is there an easy way to migrate all of our docs
